note.p: Brewer. Son of John Fox (1786/7–1861), brewer, of Farnborough, and brother of John Woodhams Fox and William Beardsworth Fox. Ensign in the Farnborough Rifle Volunteer Corps.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/462/61/8)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 February 2018)
